H0.text: Deposit lava is why volcanoes are considered constructive.

H1.text: Cause erosion is why volcanoes are considered constructive.

H2.text: Trigger earthquakes are why volcanoes are considered constructive.

H3.text: Release gases are why volcanoes are considered constructive.

A4.text: Volcanic activity is responsible for emplacing valuable mineral resources, such as metal ores.

A5.text: Large eruptions can affect atmospheric temperature as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the Sun and cool Earth's troposphere.
